# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia
function wrap_string(str::String, text_width::Int=10)::String
    lines = split(str, " ")
    output = ""
    for line in lines
        if length(output) + length(line) > text_width
            output *= "\n"
        end
        output *= "$line "
    end
    return output
end
```
Example:
```julia
julia> wrap_string("This is a very long string that needs to be wrapped", 10)
"This is a\nvery long\nstring that needs\nto be wrapped"
```
